definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: The Rapid Displacement Heating (RDH) cooking process has been developed by Beloit Corporation as an energy efficient pulping system.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了快速置换加热间歇蒸煮化学和技术的原理。

sentences.english: Medium-frequency power supply has been widely used in industrial heating.
sentences.chinese: 中频电源已广泛应用于加热领域。

sentences.english: Additional heat energy is supplied with district heating utilizing geothermally heated water.
sentences.chinese: 额外的热能由区域集中暖提供，采用地热加热的水。

sentences.english: Single set of pressing platens with both heating and cooling on the same platens .
sentences.chinese: 单套压台上同时带有加热和冷却系统的压台配置。

sentences.english: Stir in the cream and reheat to serving temperature without boiling.
sentences.chinese: 搅拌奶油，不用煮加热到合适的温度。

sentences.english: The heating would be done from a transmitter outside the body.
sentences.chinese: 加热是由体外发射机来进行的。

sentences.english: They achieve a significantly higher power density than standard medium wave heaters.
sentences.chinese: 它们可实现比标准中波加热器更高的功率密度。

sentences.english: The membrane-stripping mechanism includes an active retracting roller and a driven heating roller.
sentences.chinese: 剥膜装置包括主动卷收滚轴及从动加热滚轴。

sentences.english: So desert should take heat with cereus.
sentences.chinese: 水加热则成为蒸汽，冷却则成为冰。

sentences.english: Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low and cook for 2 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 加热至煮开，将火调小并继续煮2分钟。

sentences.english: Place frittata in broiler until top is set, about 1 minute.
sentences.chinese: 将煎饼放在上面加热约1分钟。

sentences.english: Melt chocolate with water in a small pot over a low flame.
sentences.chinese: 在一个小锅里加水和巧克力，开小火加热融化它。

sentences.english: Plastics will soften when exposed to heat.
sentences.chinese: 塑料适当加热就可以软化。

sentences.english: GENERATE】We know that heating water can generate steam.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道将水加热可以产生蒸气。

sentences.english: Good thermal transfer between heaters and load.
sentences.chinese: 良好的加热器和负载之间的热传递。

sentences.english: With heating function, and add light to illuminate.
sentences.chinese: 具有加热功能，及可加光照明。

definition: to heat/to add warmth/to raise temperature/fig. to stimulate
